overview: A one-off documentary about hit Abba musical Mamma Mia! coinciding with the release of a new movie production and including interviews with the filmâ€™s stars Meryl Streep, Pierce Brosnan, Colin Firth and Julie Walters. Also appearing are Abba members Bjorn Ulvaeus and Benny Andersson.
title: ABBA: The Mamma Mia Story
